column3: “Slow, but noticeable come on. Effects gradually become more and more potent. Mostly a head high accompanied by equally potent - if not stronger - euphoria. The high really isn’t so much heavy, but is so gone that it’s a real challenge to function or accomplish anything. Fortunately, that doesn’t faze you in the slightest because of the tons of euphoria that’ll keep you elated no matter what you do. Really, one of the...”
“excellent Sativa hybrid.  Very light and fluffy, looked like an ounce.  Burns like most sativas do, quickly into ashes.  I prefer indicas but this is a very good sativa, if that's your thing.”
“Amazing strain got hold of this in the UK it is on point”
“The three classics all wrapped in one.  Everyone that I shared this with was annihilated.   A must for any saliva lover.”
“A nice clear high, with a very positive feel.”

“Had it once when visiting an old high school friend who relocate to Oregon since in Ohio you can go to jail for smoking. Anyway meet him at bar and we went outside for a joint. I was really impressed, this stuff really f*cked me up, gave me a super high. Wasnt until i got home and sent my friend an email asking him what that weed was cause I wanted some more of it..he said it was a new strain called Royal Haze. I can...”

“Smooth, sweet buds. The taste was mighty smooth and the the high is very relaxed. Would recommend as a source of creativity/inspiration or for lounging on a sunny day. 
Definitely dank.”
“aweosome strain got me very high for a good amount of hours and also good taste”
“Strong taste, kind of unpleasant. The high makes up for it tho. Heavy and long lasting high perfect to get things done or go outdoors. good sativa”
“haze”

“A very nice hybrid sativa strain with very prominent haze characteristics. Very good for pain and depression and nausea. Not too strong, which can be good as there is little paranoia, but some dry mouth.”
“High yield”
“Amazing strain, makes you enjoy every moment and experience,it's a great strain for doing chores around the house. Might make you a little bit tired after but nothing much”

“Not quite sure why this strain isnt rating high in medicinal qualities with a CBD rating as such ? THC does not hold but three medicinal qualities on the wheel. I understand our obsession with THC. I like it too. My point is shopping  for a high THC content strain is like flying a red flag that you shop recreationally :)”

“Royal Haze is quickly becoming one of my favorite strains, due to the fact I've been a major fan of Northern Lights for more than 2 decades! Taste, aroma, and a fairly high THC % make it a truely exceptional strain.”
“A good sativa dominant, happy strain. Not very strong, but good at lifting the blues.”
“love the effects”

“All round strong. Picked up some royal haze wich had good looking texture. Imo it has a cheese-like taste to it wich i think is real nice. Smoked it as wake and bake and had a good strong high for couple of hours. Even at work i was able to work fast and concentrated. Will absolutely pick up some more royal haze in the futur”
“I'm really just not a fan of the flavor. The high is okay. It's a blowed but still good to highly function.”
“Light, motivated/energetic buzz with strong euphoria. Notable headband effects. This is good for a sativa.”
